description.value:
Trigger You attempt a melee Strike against your opponent, but haven't rolled yet.

Requirements You're in a duel, you're trained in Intimidation, and you rolled an Intimidation check for initiative this round.

If you hit, your opponent becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}. If your opponent is using Perception for initiative when this ability is used, they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2} instead.
